thread.title: Cindy Christina
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Cindy Christina

author: Cindy Christina
title: Cindy Christina
text: I would recommend this site to everyone! I have ordered several books from Thrift Books and I have been completely satisfied with every book. Each one I have received has been in terrific shape, practically new condition! No problems of any kind. The prices are unbelievable! My husband and I live on his Soc. Sec. retirement, and my SS Disability, so we are not able to buy brand new books. We both have mobility issues, don't get out a lot, so reading is my escape and one of my favorite forms of entertainment. Thanks to Thrift Books, I am able to indulge my love of reading. Thank you again so much.
